description:
2013-10-09 18:43:35.867 5236 ERROR nova.compute.manager [req-a8a83c04-03b4-4579-897f-a9825d17231e 657da0d8cf4440eca4a4ebad6fa1248a 0f7a0b0633c64e8888e6324bfe88dc16] [instance: a278d507-2112-40c2-912b-84b104300ed7] Error: Cannot resize a VHD to a smaller size

It would be helpful to debug the original and newer size in this case.
title: When resize failed in hyperv, the error message isn't sufficient for debugging.

comments.content:
2013-10-09 18:43:35.867 5236 ERROR nova.compute.manager [req-a8a83c04-03b4-4579-897f-a9825d17231e 657da0d8cf4440eca4a4ebad6fa1248a 0f7a0b0633c64e8888e6324bfe88dc16] [instance: a278d507-2112-40c2-912b-84b104300ed7] Error: Cannot resize a VHD to a smaller size

It would be helpful to debug the original and newer size in this case.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~guohliu

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/51129
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/51129
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/6ee68137c5ea9af99c1db4e2a2ce555f43a9e3e1
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 6ee68137c5ea9af99c1db4e2a2ce555f43a9e3e1
Author: guohliu <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Oct 11 14:35:21 2013 +0800

    Hyper-v: Change the hyper-v error log for debug when resize failed
    
    The error message is not sufficient enough for debug of hyper-v
    when resize error occured, this patch adding the necessary info
    in error log.
    
    Change-Id: Ic8ecb8f08139face2c7bdca258de5e719d81833c
    Closes-bug: #1238430
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
There's an error, sorry for noticing it only now after it merged.

root_vhd should be replaced with: root_vhd_internal_size

You cannot compare an internal size with a file size.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexpilotti
